metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9163 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: libautotrace.a in AutoTrace 0.31.1 has a "cannot be represented in type int" issue in pxl-outline.c:106:54.

notes.Note: msalvatore> The latest version of AutoTrace was released in 2002. Unless this project is forked or adopted by a new maintainer, this vulnerability will likely never be fixed.

criterions.comment: autotrace package in xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
